description: Schema describing the electrical child-object of a Vessel.
title: electrical

additionalProperties.title: battery
additionalProperties.description: a battery, one or many within the vessel

name.description: Primary purpose and location of battery (house, starter, starterPort, etc.)

manufactureModel.description: Model or Part number(s) of battery

voltageMeasured.description: Measured voltage of battery at battery

voltageUpperLimit.description: Upper operational limit of battery voltage

voltageUpperFault.description: Upper fault limit of battery voltage - BMS may disconnect battery

voltageLowerLimit.description: Lower operational limit of battery voltage

voltageLowerFault.description: Lower fault limit of battery voltage - BMS may disconnect battery

currentDischargeLimit.description: Operational current limit for battery discharge

currentRechargeLimit.description: Operational current limit for battery recharging

temperatureMeasured.description: Temperature of battery, in degrees Celsius

temperatureLowerDischageLimit.description: Operational minimum temperature limit for battery discharge, in degrees Celsius

temperatureLowerRechargeLimit.description: Operational minimum temperature limit for battery recharging, in degrees Celsius

temperatureUpperDischageLimit.description: Operational maximum temperature limit for battery discharge, in degrees Celsius

temperatureLowerRechargeLimit.description: Operational maximum temperature limit for battery recharging, in degrees Celsius

capacityDischargeLimit.description: Minimum number of Watt-hours to be left in the battery while discharging

LifetimeDischarge.description: Cumulative Watt-hours discharged from battery over operational lifetime of battery

LifetimeRecharge.description: Cumulative Watt-hours recharged into battery over operational lifetime of battery

additionalProperties.title: chargingSource
additionalProperties.description: And energy source that can be used to recharge a battery.  Solar, Alternator, shore power. .

name.description: Description and location (alternatorPort, DCGeneator, solar1, inverterCharger, etc.)

manufactureModel.description: Model or Part number(s) of battery

associatedBattery.description: Battery name charger is assocated with

currentMeasured.description: Measured amperage being provided by charging source

currentCapacity.description: Maximum amperage charging source is capable of supplying

mode.description: Current operational mode of charging source
